jwt.key: add some random generated string here min 32length

app.secret: add some random generated string here min 32length

payU.enabled: write true to enable payu and false to disable payu, make sure to write true or false without double codes as it is boolean value
payU.environment: write test to run payu in test environment, live to make payu work with live payments
payU.merchantKey: your payu merchant key (test key for test, live key for live)
payU.merchantSalt: your payu merchant salt (test salt for test, live salt for live)
